name: Flying a BOEING 737-200 COMBI to a remote Inuit village
description:
I took a flight on a 40 year old Boeing 737-200 Combi with Air Inuit to spend a night in a remote Arctic Inuit village in the north of Quebec.

Check out Flight Attendant Phil's YouTube channel The Blizzard Flyer! https://www.youtube.com/c/TheBlizzardFlyer

OFFICIAL NOEL MERCH: www.noelphilips.com
JOIN ME ON WHATSAPP, GET WEEKLY LIVE CHATS AND MUCH MORE - SUPPORT ME ON PATREON! http://patreon.com/inflightvideo
